name: RunBot - Parkour Running Game
description:
Are you ready to test your parkour skills on this stunning 3D infinite runner game? Master your new robotic armour and boost your run through this dash and dodge game: avoid laser traps or metal walls, shoot your blaster and destroy enemy drones, jump and fly over the city with your turbo jetpack, reach your critical velocity in the ultimate running action game!

“Flying is the best part of the game” - Touch Arcade

Straight from future, you’re RunBot, the ultimate runner cyborg of our corporation, and it’s your time to find your freedom in the most intense third person parkour game! Hold your sprint, don’t slow down your rush and surf over the street as quickly as possible. Drag to jump or slide and to move left or right, all acrobatics moves with an intuitive one-finger control!

“RunBot … is a slick, 3D futuristic endless runner” - App Advice

Try to collect every coin during your race and level up your armour skills and cyberpunk runner skins. Can you collect all of them and complete this acrobatic run game? Use insane power ups to boost your sprint like the energy shield or the nitro speed on a new run and slice game ... How far can you run in this destructive endless runner?

“Even though the game is just running, there are two difficulties available: casual and hardcore” - App Advice

==GAME FEATURES==

UPGRADE AND EVOLVE YOUR ROBOT
Collect coins and power cores to upgrade your arsenal and armor, improve your power-ups like laser or shield and be invincible in this rush game!
Achieve all the robot gadgets: nanomachines, radar, jetpack, autoshield… Will you be able to reach the highest level ? Be a hero on a new run and dodging game!

FUTURISTIC RUNNING STYLE
Awesome acrobatic moves, be the lasted parkour runner, jump and dodge around dangerous obstacles like mines or plasma turrets.
The best run and jumping game in Google Play is waiting you in RunBot!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR RUNNER
Change the appearance of your cyborg applying different characters and runner skins. What kind of armor do you prefer? Aerospace, Combat, Energy… Each with special characteristics that help you in this running adventure game.
Pose with your running items and create your favourite runner. Show your friends who is the best parkour runner!

EASY TO PLAY, HARD TO MASTER
Simple and intuitive interface. All the acrobatic moves with one finger! Activate the jetpack mode and fly over the dangerous enemies or slide under the obstacles in this infinite running simulator!
Feel the amazing VR view mode and experience the endless fun running and dodging at full speed on a new exciting runner adventure.

BEAT YOUR FRIENDS
Synchronize with Facebook, challenge all your friends and be the leader of the ranking online on a new infinity running game. Run past your buddies' high scores in this runner arcade and become the top runner of this running score game!

UNIQUE DETAILS
Innovate and stunning 3D graphics in a race with RunBot through a futuristic city in this infinite runner game.
Amazing and full-detailed urban scenarios with multiple possible pathways. Dodge the wacky obstacles and earn all rewards in each race on a new endless runner game.

Check out the official game video, dodging fast the dangerous obstacles with your acrobatics moves in this endless running game:
https://youtu.be/aFuI8Tv28X0

PLEASE NOTE: RunBot - Subway Running Race is a completely free 3D running game. However, you can also purchase some items within the game for real money. Just disable in-app purchases on your device if you don’t want to use this feature in the game.
